overview:
Nilesh Seth has served as ourSenior Vice President of Product Development and Technology at Gamefly since April 2008 and served as our Vice President of Product Management from September 2003 until April 2008. Prior to joining GameFly, Mr. Seth served as Vice President, Applied Technology at eStyle, Inc. from September 1999 to September 2003. Mr. Seth began his career at Andersen Consulting (now Accenture) where he worked from 1993 to 1999.

Mr. Seth holds a Bachelor of Science degree in Mathematics/Applied Science (Economics) from the University of California, Los Angeles.
